title: Housing complexes, Commercial establishments, hostels, hospitals having aggregate built- up area more than 4,000 sq
clause_text: Housing complexes, Commercial establishments, hostels, hospitals having aggregate built- up area more than 4,000 sq.m. or more.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
